title: Hotel Continental
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, British, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Specializes in vegetarian food as the owners are lifelong vegetarians. Offers a separate vegetarian menu with 6 vegan options. Some vegan dishes include puy lentil fritters with cumin and fresh coriander served with couscous and cherry tomato raita, roast tomato tart with olive oil crust, vegan nut roast served with mushroom sauce, steamed vegetables & new potatoes. Located in a boutique/art hotel overlooking Dovercourt Bay and within one mile of an international port for ferry and cruise ship passengers. Uses organic local produce. Free Wi-Fi. Open all day to non-residents as well as residents.
